name: Inflatable doll
description:
A beautiful woman will always catch a boy's eye. Where you look depends on your preferences. This game could be the start for you!



Game Features:
1. Up to 15 beautiful CGs in total.
2. Extremely test reaction ability and hand speed.
3. Catchy BGM lets you immerse yourself in the scene.

Gameplay:
This is a puzzle game. Each level will present a CG, but there will be a lot of box blocks blocking her. Up to 100 squares, they flicker randomly. You, on the other hand, need to click on it when it turns red, so you can get rid of it. When you eliminate all the boxes, you can enjoy the full beautiful CG.
